code: public void configure() {     // START SNIPPET: example     // lets define the namespaces we'll need in our filters     Namespaces ns = new Namespaces("c", "http://acme.com/cheese").add("xsd", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema").     // now lets create an xpath based Message Filter     from("direct:start").filter(xpath("/c:person[@name='James']", String.class).namespaces(ns)).to("mock:result"). // END SNIPPET: example }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             // START SNIPPET: example             // lets define the namespaces we'll need in our filters             Namespaces ns = new Namespaces("c", "http://acme.com/cheese").add("xsd", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema").             // now lets create an xpath based Message Filter             from("direct:start").filter(xpath("/c:person[@name='James']", String.class).namespaces(ns)).to("mock:result").         // END SNIPPET: example         }     }. }
